  • Method Details

    • createTask

      @RequestMapping(value="/api/task", method=POST) @ResponseStatus(OK) public Schedule createTask(@CookieValue(name="access-token") AccessToken accessToken, @RequestParam String scheduleName, @RequestBody Task task)
      Creates a task in a given schedule
      Parameters:
      accessToken - used to authenticate the user
      scheduleName - used to find the schedule
      task - the task to create and put into the schedule
      Returns:
      the schedule with the new task

    • deleteTask

      @RequestMapping(value="/api/task", method=DELETE) @ResponseStatus(OK) public Schedule deleteTask(@CookieValue(name="access-token") AccessToken accessToken, @RequestParam String scheduleName, @RequestBody Task task)
      Deletes a task from a given schedule
      Parameters:
      accessToken - used to authenticate the user
      scheduleName - used to find the schedule
      task - the task to delete from the schedule
      Returns:
      the schedule without the given task

    • changeTask

      @RequestMapping(value="/api/task", method=PUT) @ResponseStatus(OK) public Schedule changeTask(@CookieValue(name="access-token") AccessToken accessToken, @RequestParam String scheduleName, @RequestParam int taskId, @RequestParam(required=false) LocalTime time, @RequestParam(required=false) Weekday day, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer amount)
      Changes a tasks properties
      Parameters:
      accessToken - used to find the schedule
      scheduleName - used to find the schedule
      taskId - used to find the task in the schedule
      time - at which the task should be done
      day - on which the task should be done
      amount - which should be dispensed
      Returns:
      schedule the task is a child of
